solution_line_template: Seafoam Valley has {seafoam_numerator}/{seafoam_denominator} as many skirts as Azure Valley, or ({seafoam_numerator} * {azure_valley_skirts}) / {seafoam_denominator} = {intermediate_product_l1}/{seafoam_denominator} = <<{seafoam_numerator}*{azure_valley_skirts}/{seafoam_denominator}={seafoam_valley_skirts}>>{seafoam_valley_skirts} skirts.

Purple Valley has {purple_numerator}/{purple_denominator} as many skirts as Seafoam Valley, or {seafoam_valley_skirts}/{purple_denominator} = <<{seafoam_valley_skirts}/{purple_denominator}={purple_valley_skirts}>>{purple_valley_skirts} skirts.
